談.definition: to speak; to talk; to converse; to chat; to discuss

談不上.definition: to be out of the question

談判.definition: to negotiate; negotiation; talks; conference; CL:個|个[ge4]

談到.definition: to refer to; to speak about; to talk about

談古論今.definition: to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom); to chat freely; to discuss everything

談天說地.definition: to talk endlessly; to talk about everything under the sun

談妥.definition: to come to terms; to reach an agreement

談得來.definition: to be able to talk to; to get along with; to be congenial

談性變色.definition: to turn green at the mention of sex; prudish

談情說愛.definition: to murmur endearments (idiom); to get into a romantic relationship

談戀愛.definition: to court; to go steady; to be dating

談笑自若.definition: to talk and laugh as though nothing had happened; to remain cheerful (despite a crisis)

談笑風生.definition: to talk cheerfully and wittily; to joke together

談經.definition: to explain a sutra; to expound the classics

談虎色變.definition: lit. to turn pale at the mention of a tiger (idiom); fig. to be terrified at the thought (of it)

談話.definition: to talk (with sb); to have a conversation; talk; conversation; CL:次[ci4]

談談.definition: to discuss; to have a chat

談資.definition: sth that people like to chat about; topic of idle conversation

談起.definition: to mention; to speak of; to talk about
